132  // Convenience functions.
133  inline bool isFixed(FloatingPoint dist_m) const {
134  return std::abs(dist_m) < config_.min_distance_m;
135  }
137  void clear() {
138  updated_blocks_.clear();
139  open_.clear();
140  raise_ = AlignedQueue<GlobalIndex>();
141  }
143  float getEsdfMaxDistance() const { return config_.max_distance_m; }
144  void setEsdfMaxDistance(float max_distance) {
145  config_.max_distance_m = max_distance;
146  if (config_.default_distance_m < max_distance) {
147  config_.default_distance_m = max_distance;
148  }
149  }
150  bool getFullEuclidean() const { return config_.full_euclidean_distance; }
151  void setFullEuclidean(bool full_euclidean) {
152  config_.full_euclidean_distance = full_euclidean;
